languages.text: "Неужели, они знали и были правы?.. Неужели все из-за нас... нашего спасения?.."

traits.locale_text: "Неужели, они знали и были правы?.. Неужели все из-за нас... нашего спасения?.."

languages.text: "Did they know all along? Were they right? Could it all be because of us... because we were saved?"
languages.original_text: "Неужели, они знали и были правы?.. Неужели все из-за нас... нашего спасения?.."

traits.locale_text: "Had they known all along? Were they right? Could it all be because of us — because we were saved?"
"Had they known all along? Were they right? Could it all be because of us — because we were saved?"
"Had they known all along? Were they right? Could it all be because of us... because we were saved?"
"Had they known all along? Were they right? Could it all be because of us... because we were saved?"
"Did they know all along? Were they right? Could it all be because of us... because we were saved?"
"Did they know all along? Were they right? Could it all be because of us... because we were saved?"

languages.text: "Wussten sie es die ganze Zeit über? Hatten sie recht? Ist das alles nur unseretwegen ... weil wir gerettet wurden?"
languages.original_text: "Did they know all along? Were they right? Could it all be because of us... because we were saved?"

traits.locale_text: "Wussten sie es die ganze Zeit über? Hatten sie recht? Ist das alles nur unseretwegen ... weil wir gerettet wurden?"

languages.text: « Savaient-ils depuis le début ? Avaient-ils raison ? Est-ce notre faute... parce que nous avons été sauvés ? »
languages.original_text: "Did they know all along? Were they right? Could it all be because of us... because we were saved?"

traits.locale_text: « Savaient-ils depuis le début ? Avaient-ils raison ? Est-ce notre faute... parce que nous avons été sauvés ? »

languages.text: “他们早就知道了吗？原来他们说得没错吗？之所以会发生这种事情，会不会是因为我们的错……因为我们被救下来了？”
languages.original_text: "Did they know all along? Were they right? Could it all be because of us... because we were saved?"

traits.locale_text: “他们早就知道了吗？原来他们说得没错吗？之所以会发生这种事情，会不会是因为我们的错……因为我们被救下来了？”

languages.text: 「ずっと知っていたのか？彼らが正しかったのか？全部私達のせいなのか…私達が救われたから？」
languages.original_text: "Did they know all along? Were they right? Could it all be because of us... because we were saved?"

traits.locale_text: 「ずっと知っていたのか？彼らが正しかったのか？全部私達のせいなのか…私達が救われたから？」

languages.text: «¿Lo sabían desde el principio? ¿Tenían razón? ¿Podría ser todo por nuestra culpa... por habernos salvado?».
languages.original_text: "Did they know all along? Were they right? Could it all be because of us... because we were saved?"

traits.locale_text: «¿Lo sabían desde el principio? ¿Tenían razón? ¿Podría ser todo por nuestra culpa... por habernos salvado?».

languages.text: "En başından beri biliyorlar mıydı? Haklılar mıydı? Bizim yüzümüzden mi oldu? Kurtarıldık diye mi?"
languages.original_text: "Did they know all along? Were they right? Could it all be because of us... because we were saved?"

traits.locale_text: "Ta başından beri biliyorlar mıydı? Haklılar mıydı? Acaba bu olayın sorumlusu biz miyiz? Sırf kurtarıldık diye..."
